## [v1.1.0]
> Oct  1, 2015

* Add `onmount.debug`.

## [v1.0.2]
> Jul  1, 2015

* Fix devDependencies being wrongfully installed.
* Update tests.

## [v1.0.1]
> Jul  1, 2015

* Update keywords and description
* Allow overriding of MutationObserver via polyfill (`onmount.MutationObserver = ..`)

## v1.0.0
> Jun 30, 2015

* Initial release.
